raw_comment: I notice that there are more young people that have hope for the world. the elders gove more negative answers. I wonder why it is that older people have less hope and if over time the younger peoples answers will change. This relates to me because I am also a young person who believes that the workd could become better. I would name this graph, "Is the World changing for better."
ace_sentences: I notice that more young people have hope for the world.
Older people give more negative answers.
I wonder why older people have less hope.
I wonder if the answers of young people will change over time.
I believe that the world could become better.
The name of this graph is: Is the world changing for better.
